column4: OK guys, like an idiot I accidentally emoved the volume control that is the default in the pannel - how do I get it back - I don;t like the one that shows up when I use the "add t Pannel" - for those that know me, you see I do really silly things, buying cheao disks and hitting wrong buttons :)
i belive the default thingy is called 'indicator applet' - includes volume knob
rmb on panel and select 'add to panel', then find it and add it
